name: Stolen Ducks
description:
The good ducks have been stolen by the evil duck for liking water. The great evil duck has been terrified of water for many years, and has stolen the good ducks for their love of it! You must save them from his capture, in this action packed top down shooting game of freedom!

Controls:
  • WSAD / ARROWS - MOVE
  • MOUSE - SHOOT

Made for taku's mini jam using the two themes, cute and evil and rubber ducks.
